name: cities
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool referential.
Tool description: The fastest API to access countries, states, cities, continents, dial and zip codes in up to 20 languages. A collection of data APIs to support forms, signups, search and lookup. Our endpoints are optimized for speed and size. Our data is regularly maintained and comes from International Standardization bodies, the United Nations, government surveys and GIS datasets. We do not scrape WikiPedia etc
API description: List and search over 75,000 world cities in 20 languages.

limit.description: Limit results to N results, default is 250.

state_hasc.description: Filter on the state's HASC code. List available at /v1/state.

timezone.description: Filter results based on the timezone name. List available at /v1/timezone.

prefix.description: Search cities by names starting with the given prefix. The default prefix is 'san fr'.

timezone_offset.description: Filter results based on the timezone offset in hours.

sort.description: Sort on field [population, state_code, name, timezone, state_hasc, iso_a2]. Please see limit and order fields.

lang.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

iso_a2.description: Filter results based on the 2-letter country code. Default is 'us'.

name.description: Search for city names that contain the specified name.

state_code.description: Filter results based on the state's ISO-3166-2 letter code. Default is 'US-CA'.

fields.description: Select fields to return in the result (e.g., iso_a2, state_code, timezone, timezone_offset, state_hasc, geonameid). Default fields are 'iso_a2,state_code,state_hasc,timezone,timezone_offset'.

order.description: Specify the sort order, either ascending ('asc') or descending ('desc').
